title.rendered: Eldorado Outdoor Artisan Fire Bowls Featured in Garden Design Magazine

content.rendered: From traditional landscapes to modern outdoor designs, Eldorado Outdoor Artisan Fire Bowls complement virtually all outdoor spaces. Made from glass-reinforced concrete, this chic line of products are hand-sanded through a four-step finishing process, rendering each Artisan Fire Bowl a true one-of-a-kind creation, with subtle variations in color and texture.

excerpt.rendered: From traditional landscapes to modern outdoor designs, Eldorado Outdoor Artisan Fire Bowls complement virtually all outdoor spaces. Made from glass-reinforced concrete, this chic line of products are hand-sanded through a four-step finishing process, rendering each Artisan Fire Bowl a true one-of-a-kind creation, with subtle variations in color and texture.
